Well, Christ did not die in vain, must have been a reason for Him to come  =

here to begin with, and I don't want to bust bubbles, incarnation is far  =

different from reincarnation.  We retain our identity after the change  ca=
lled 
death, if anyone wants to come back here over again, so be it, but ca=
n't  
pay me too.   Well, maybe for a little visit, <g>. sf

e dated 10/17/2010 1:26:18 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
adrianamjones@yaho=
o.com writes:

 
 
 
I don't know one way or the other about reincarnation.=

sides don't know what to believe... but can certainly un=
derstand the idea that  
we would share cellular memories, regardles of whe=
ther or not full  
reincarnation is real... fascinating ideas and possibili=
ties  there..
